snippet.title: Valkyria Chronicles II - Final Scout Exam [DLC] (1 Turn)
snippet.description:
I love this video game series way too much. Even this one, though the grinding in this one in particular can be pretty ridiculous and the story is not my favorite of the three.
Unfortunately, RNG decides whether you can 1-turn this mission. If there are two crates in Area 3 and only one crate at the closer spawn position in Area 4 (and ideally only one crate at the closer spawn position in Area 5),  it's far easier. Otherwise, you have to get lucky with Truth Seeker on Lotte in Area 4. There's also a lot of fiddling around with the Gatling Turret in Area 2 because I thought of that during this run and wasn't sure if I could get Alicia to hit "around" the front.
Besides that, it's a whole lot of waiting for Anti-Intercept to proc then running headfirst into everything. Sounds like scouts to me.
